page.title: 08EDUCATION
page.content: MY FAVOURITE LESSON BY SIMON. MY FAVOURITE SUBJECT IS HISTORY.IT IS VERY INTERESTING TO SEE HOW PEOPLE LIVED A LONG TIME AGO. SOMETIMES WE DO BIG PROJECTS.LAST YEAR WE DID A BIG PROJECT ABOUT THE NORMANS. WE HAD A DRAMA PRODUCTION CALLED 'HAROLD'.WE MADE ALL THE COSTUMES AND SCENERY,WE LEARNED SONGS,PLAYED INSTRUMENTS,AND MADE A TAPESTRY SIMILAR TO A PANEL FROM THE BAYEUX TAPESTRY.WE STITCHED BOATS,TREES AND PEOPLE ON THE CANVAS. OUR FAMILIES AND PEOPLE FROM THE VILLAGE CAME TO SEE IT AT THE END OF TERM.
